description: This file defines a React component 'CreateIssueDialog' for creating Jira issues via a dialog interface. It manages form state, fetches issue types and users based on selected project, and handles issue creation with user feedback.

classes.name: CreateIssueDialogProps
classes.description: Props interface for the CreateIssueDialog component, including open state, close handler, project list, and credentials.

methods.name: createIssueFormSchema
methods.description: Zod schema defining validation rules for the create issue form.

methods.name: CreateIssueDialog
methods.description: React functional component rendering a dialog for creating Jira issues, managing form state, fetching related data, and handling submission.
